meanings: (정치적으로 대립 관계에 있는 사람) political opponent[rival, enemy]

vlive.korean: 뭐야 이 정적은? What is this silence? 듣기 View video ITZY : 믿지 믿지!!!!!!

vlive.english: [Silence] Who is in the first place?

vlive.korean: 환호 소리 듣고 그 정적이 뭔가... You hear the chant and that silence is sort of... 듣기 View video V HEARTBEAT - 2019 VLIVE AWARDS : [Full] 2019 VLIVE AWARDS V HEARTBEAT PART3
vlive.english: You hear the chant and that silence is sort of...

vlive.korean: 약간 정적이 나버렸는데 최대한... So, we had a few silent moments. But, I'll do my best today. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 뚝딱뚝딱 공작시간

vlive.korean: [노벨멤버놀리기상 없냐고 만들어서라도 줘야한다고] 갑자기 정적! [Let's make Noble prize for impersonation] A sudden silence! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [1년 전 오늘의 SEVENEETN] 💎캐럿이 벌써 1365일이라니.. 눈물이 나네요?💦 (CARAT’s 1000days a year ago)
vlive.english: [Let's make Noble prize for impersonation] A sudden silence!

examples.korean: The sound of footsteps on the path broke the stillness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 보도 위의 발자국 소리가 정적을 깨뜨렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound of footsteps on the path broke the stillness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her thin voice trailed off into silence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 가냘픈 목소리가 정적 속으로 길게 이어지다가 잠잠해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her thin voice trailed off into silence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Only the snores of the sleepers broke the silence of the house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잠 든 사람들의 코 고는 소리만이 집 안의 정적을 깼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Only the snores of the sleepers broke the silence of the house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to use strong-arm tactics against your political opponents 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정적들에 대해 강압 작전을 쓰다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to use strong-arm tactics against your political opponents Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He swore to take (his) revenge on his political enemies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자신의 정적들에게 복수를 하리라고 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He swore to take (his) revenge on his political enemies. Add to Wordbook
